input_email_body:
Subject: Billing Discrepancies in AWS Services

Dear IT Consulting Firm Customer Support, 

I hope this message finds you well. My name is <name> and I am writing to express a concern regarding billing discrepancies we have experienced while managing our AWS resources through your services. We have noticed unexpected charges and are seeking assistance in investigating the configuration settings that might be causing these additional costs. Our primary aim is to identify potential cost optimizations in the AWS Management Service provided by your firm My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Kindly prioritize this issue at your earliest convenience and let us know how to proceed with the investigation or if any additional information is required. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards, 
<name>
<acc_num>
<tel_num> You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.
